basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Cathy Stults Scholarship in French Studies

description: This scholarship, established by alumnus Ben Odom, acknowledges the contributions of the late Dr. Stults to the French program at UCO and her exceptional dedication to her students. The French major or minor who receives this award shows strong academic achievement and must be active in support of the French Club or the French-speaking community. Eligibility Requirements Major or minor in French Minimum 3.5 GPA Active in French Club or the French speaking community Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
